description: Defines a Note class representing a note entity, with properties like id, title, content, and timestamps. Includes methods for copying and converting to/from map representations, used for local storage in SQLite.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data model class for a note entity stored locally using SQLite, with properties for id, title, content, creation and update timestamps, and methods for copying and serialization.

methods.name: Note.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with optional overridden fields.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a Map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Instantiate a Note object from a Map, typically retrieved from the database.
